item.title: State Synchronization Protocol
item.description: Original article Mosh - YouTube Paper https://mosh.org/mosh-paper.pdf SSP protocol State Synchronization Protocol: A new secure object synchronization protocol on top of UDP to synchronize abstract state objects in the presence of roaming, intermittent connectivity, and marginal networks.
